title: Behavior of function from graph of derivative

content.prompt: The graph of f', the derivative of f, is shown above. The line tangent to the graph of f' at x = 0 is vertical, and f' is not differentiable at x = 2. Which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: The graph of f has a point of inflection at x = 2.
The graph of f has a point of inflection at x = 0.

topic.text: 5.9: Connecting a Function, Its First Derivative, and Its Second Derivative

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
